# Government Tender Announcement

## ITT_W6898-240655_A: Inspection and Maintenance of Delta Direct Digital Control Systems at DND Various Locations, New Brunswick

** solicitationNumber-numeroSollicitation**: WS4401721521

### Tender Information

* **Publication Date**: January 25, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 13, 2024 at 14:00:00 hours
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025, with an option to renew for two one-year periods

### Contract Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the furnishing of all labour, materials, tools, equipment, software, and firmware updates necessary to complete the annual on-site inspection and repairs to the Delta Version 3 Orcaview building automation systems at the Bathurst, Newcastle, and Campbellton Armouries.

### Contract Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) seeks a service contract for the inspection and maintenance of Delta Direct Digital Control Systems at the CFB Gagetown locations. The contract will commence on April 1, 2024, and is expected to conclude on March 31, 2025, with an option for renewal for two one-year periods.

### Technical Specifications

* **UNSPSC**: 32150000 (Automation control devices and components and accessories) and 72100000 (Building and facility maintenance and repair services)
* **Regions Of Delivery**: New Brunswick

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Gary Bryant
* **Title**: (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:gary.bryant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tendering Procedure

A Request for Proposal (RFP) process is being used to procure the services. The lowest price will be the evaluation criterion.
